entries.s_f24ae96: I'm a crack shot with a blaster.
entries.s_e0741a0c: Captain Sarguillo has need of good soldiers like you. He's right over there.
entries.s_de1f69ee: Well they are going to have a tough time with all the new defenses.
entries.s_d1431da3: Apparently not. I think they are looking to finish us off this time.
entries.s_bdd3bae5: Here you are.  Remember you may use the crystal to view your progress.
entries.s_ae755ac3: Well we need good skirmishers to meet them head on. Speak to Captain Sarguillo, right over there.
entries.s_a098d669: Again? Haven't they learned their lesson?
entries.s_9dc8bf5d: I seem to have misplaced my Force crystal.  May I have another?
entries.s_97092ac2: I'm a crafter, what can I do in a battle?
entries.s_8c109ae0: I am sure Sivarra will need all the help she can get. You can find her at the medic tent to the Northwest.
entries.s_8aa931e3: Be careful, we've received information that the Sith Shadows will attack soon.
entries.s_4d4da25b: I am a medic. I could help heal your soldiers.
entries.s_48fd623: Speak to our new chief engineer, he is new and a bit frazzled. You would be a great help to him. You can find him to the East at his hut near the sensor array.
entries.s_448b67d0: They seem to be our bane. For some reason they assaulted our village many days ago. We've been rebuilding and reinforcing our village ever since.
entries.s_199fe2af: I sense you already have a crystal and do not need another.
entries.s_17446822: I am tough enough to pull the ears off a gundark.
entries.s_12b92ec4: I sure hope so, but I think we're going to need more help than just the shield generator and blaster turrets.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (village_elder_4.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
